price: 1. Oh bino bato! Bobanga Nkolo wa bino. Ya soló, koningana ya mabele na ngonga (ya mokolo yasuka) ekozalaka somo mpe makasi.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ إِنَّ زَلۡزَلَةَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ شَيۡءٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu ittaqū rabbakum inna zalzalata al-sāʿati shayon ʿaẓīmun
